description: This file sets up a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline using various components such as a PDF knowledge base, a vector database (LanceDB), and an OpenAI language model. It creates a knowledge base from a PDF URL, loads it, configures an agent with specific parameters, and prompts the agent to answer a culinary question.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that fetches and manages PDF content from URLs.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database for storing and searching embeddings.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: An enumeration specifying the type of search (e.g., vector search).

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that manages interaction with the language model and knowledge base.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: A class for creating text embeddings using OpenAI models.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing the OpenAI chat-based language model.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base content into memory.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt, optionally streaming the output.
